title: Crispy duck with garlic and rosemary roast potatoes
ingredients: ['600g ready-washed baby new potatoes', '8 garlic cloves, peeled', '2 tbsp chopped fresh rosemary', '4 duck breast fillets, about 190g each', '8 fresh bay leaves, plus extra to garnish', 'fruit jelly or preserve, such as crab apple, rowanberry or redcurrant, to serve']
